qas.question: When did the second terminal open at the Mexico City Airport?
How many national airlines are there in Mexico?
How many of the main Mexican airlines are based in Mexico City?
What is the new city that will be added to the group of Mexican Airports around Mexico City?

context: In the Mexico City airport, the government engaged in an extensive restructuring program that includes the addition of a new second terminal, which began operations in <a0_0>2007<a0_0/>, and the enlargement of four other airports (at the nearby cities of Toluca, Querétaro, Puebla and Cuernavaca) that, along with Mexico City's airport, comprise the Grupo Aeroportuario del Valle de México, distributing traffic to different regions in Mexico. The city of <a3_0>Pachuca<a3_0/> will also provide additional expansion to central Mexico's airport network. Mexico City's airport is the main hub for <a2_0>11<a2_0/> of the <a1_0>21<a1_0/> national airline companies.
